pr_title: Convert multiplayer staging screen alliance label to 'click to play alliance' button

timeline.message:
Convert multiplayer staging screen alliance label to 'click to play alliance' button

Clicking alliance buttons will take the seat of all factions in that alliance,
clicking again will release all such seats. The single player staging screen already
has 'alliance' buttons, this update makes the multiplayer staging screens
similar.

A notable use-case is to start games more quickly, for example launching NWO
a host can click 'allies' on start-up to release all allied players and a client
can then click 'allies' to take all of the released seats.
